thread.section_title: Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Location - Review of Shelburne NYC-an Affinia hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Aaron W
title: Great Location
text:
Stayed for 3 nights, on a business trip, and prefer Shelburne over a major chain hotel any day of the week. Location is walk able to most major attractions, close to LGA and Grand Central, but maintains a great New York feel. Room sizes are great as is the concierge staff, and there's a good restaurant with room service if needed.
Room Tip: Ask for an outside facing room. Otherwise you may end up looking directly into other rooms. See more room tips
